name: Madman Catcher
description:
The doctor who experimented with pills was left without patients. You will have to get new pills, but be careful: the escaped patients will not let you get them. And at the end you will meet the main initiator of the escape.

"Madman Catcher" is a classic 2D platform game. The main goal is to get pills of the right color from scattered first-aid kits. Just beware of the mentally ill patients, they are not very happy with your work (that`s why they ran away and do not want to return).

Game Features:
  • Classic gameplay
  • Nice Pixel-Art visuals
  • Steam Achievements support
  • Awesome OST
